p: Therefore, the aims of the present study were to describe the phytochemical profile of C. zeylanicum Blume and to investigate the in vitro antifungal activity, the mode of action, and the effect on the growth kinetics of Candida spp. in planktonic form and in biofilms of the essential oil (EO) extracted from leaves. In addition, the cytotoxic effect of this natural product on human peripheral blood cells and its phytochemical profile are described.
